name: Uly's Realm alpha
description:
Made within 4 days for the 10 day Unijam 2 game jam.

Controls:
Left click: Shoot.
WASD: Move.
F: Interact with doors.
M: Reset soundtrack (or it would skip to the next song if there was more than 1 current song).

Features:
-Player and gun with animations.
-2 levels (only one is built in for now).
-Some sort of... music?.
-Ulysse (boss).

Missing features:

-Ulysse animations.
-Any kind of health or attacks for Ulysse.
-Any kind of way to win or lose, or interact with Ulysse.
